sentences.sContent: Class enrollment, where each student has all of the course schedule selections, each student having his own bucket in the CGTT.
sentences.sContent_eng: Class enrollment, where each student has all of the course schedule selections, each student having his own bucket in the CGTT.
sentences.sCn: 班级入学，每个学生都有所有的课程安排选择，每个学生都将自己的选择放在 CGTT 中。

sentences.sContent: ...China will endeavor to increase the enrollment in vocational colleges...
...which has closely studied enrollment patterns in higher education...
